Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard/Main Street Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Eidenhoft Boulevard and Main Street.
Room.LongDescription: Main Street runs east to west and intersects Eidenhoft Boulevard which is a popular north south throughfare. There are a lot of little shops along Main Street, and many of them have strange and unfamiliar things on display. Most merchandise comes from far off lands, brought here by seamen hoping to earn a little gold before wasting it at the pubs. Over on the southwest corner is a shop called, "Dante's Daggers and Darts." The entrance is just off of Main Street.
